setup_script_description: sets focus on the third radio button
specific_user_instruction: Starting at the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Regular crust' radio button.

testPlanStrings.commandListPreface: Do this with each of the following commands or command sequences.

testPlanStrings.assertionResponseQuestion: Which statements are true about the response to

output_assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the radio button, 'Regular crust', is conveyed
